tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE governance_audit_trail (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    action_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    decision_made TEXT NOT NULL,
    decision_date TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    decision_maker VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE governance_decisions (
  decision_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  decision_description VARCHAR(255),
  decision_date DATE,
  decision_owner VARCHAR(50),
  decision_status VARCHAR(20)
);

CREATE TABLE governance_actions (
  action_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  action_description VARCHAR(255),
  action_date DATE,
  action_owner VARCHAR(50),
  decision_id INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (decision_id) REFERENCES governance_decisions(decision_id)
);

CREATE TABLE decision_audit_trail (
    decision_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    decision_name VARCHAR(255),
    decision_date DATE,
    decision_maker VARCHAR(255),
    decision_description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE action_audit_trail (
    action_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    decision_id INT,
    action_name VARCHAR(255),
    action_date DATE,
    action_executor VARCHAR(255),
    action_description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE decision_participants (
    participant_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    decision_id INT,
    participant_name VARCHAR(255),
    participant_role VARCHAR(255)
)

CREATE TABLE decision_outcomes (
    outcome_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    decision_id INT,
    outcome_name VARCHAR(255),
    outcome_description TEXT,
    outcome_evaluation TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE decision_actions (
   decision_id UUID,
   action_id UUID,
   PRIMARY KEY (decision_id, action_id),
   FOREIGN KEY (decision_id) REFERENCES governance_decisions(decision_id),
   FOREIGN KEY (action_id) REFERENCES governance_actions(action_id)
);
